thread.title: 2018 Toyota C-HR First Drive: Cheerful and Chunky
thread.title_full: 2018 Toyota C-HR First Drive: Cheerful and Chunky

author: Andrew Wendler
title: 2018 Toyota C-HR First Drive: Cheerful and Chunky
text:
-Although Scion was snuffed out last year, the spirit of the entry-level brand lives on in Toyota models like the new C-HR subcompact SUV crossover . Although the C-HR was originally destined to wear a Scion badge in the States, it was a relatively painless process for Toyota to pivot and bring the funky crossover in as a Toyota. (The C-HR was already slated to be sold as a Toyota in overseas markets.) With vehicles such as the Nissan Juke, the Kia Soul, and the similarly sized Honda HR-V maintaining steady sales, it was critical that Toyota field a subcompact crossover in the United States. READ MORE ›› 
-
